While more work is still needed to determine the applicability of this approach, this study provides an interesting example of how EXAFS analysis can provide insight into the thermodynamic characteristics of the material. In particular, the results obtained by Small et al., Figure 21 b, suggest significant differences in the strain energies for NPs under different environments that may affect the equilibrium geometry of the NPs as well as their thermodynamic properties.
